data.lyric:
[ti:Astronaut In The Ocean]
[ar:Masked Wolf]
[al:Astronaut In The Ocean]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Astronaut In The Ocean - Masked Wolf
[00:02.31]Lyrics by：Harry Michael/Tyron Hapi
[00:04.63]Astro-naut
[00:14.85]What you know about rollin' down in the deep
[00:18.04]When your brain goes numb you can call that mental freeze
[00:21.28]When these people talk too much
[00:22.79]Put that s**t in slow motion yeah
[00:24.83]I feel like an astronaut in the ocean ayy
[00:28.01]What you know about rollin' down in the deep
[00:30.82]When your brain goes numb you can call that mental freeze
[00:34.11]When these people talk too much
[00:35.61]Put that s**t in slow motion yeah
[00:37.64]I feel like an astronaut in the ocean
[00:40.60]She say that I'm cool
[00:41.42]D**n straight
[00:42.01]I'm like "Yeah that's true"
[00:43.04]That's true
[00:43.68]I believe in G-O-D
[00:44.81]Ayy
[00:45.22]Don't believe in T-H-O-T
[00:46.82]She keep playing me dumb
[00:48.04]Play me
[00:48.42]I'ma play her for fun
[00:49.62]Uh-huh
[00:49.98]Y'all don't really know my mental
[00:51.30]Let me give you the picture like stencil
[00:52.84]Fallin' out in a drought
[00:54.51]No flow rain wasn't pourin' down
[00:55.77]Pourin' down
[00:56.20]See that pain was all around
[00:57.58]See my mode was kinda lounged
[00:59.22]Didn't know which which way to turn
[01:00.85]Flow was cool but I still felt burnt
[01:02.43]Energy up you can feel my surge
[01:04.02]I'ma kill everything like this purge
[01:05.62]Ayy
[01:06.40]Let's just get this straight for a second I'ma work
[01:08.80]Yuh
[01:09.28]Even if I don't get paid for progression I'ma get it
[01:12.19]Uh get it
[01:12.72]Everything that I do is electric
[01:14.76]Ayy
[01:14.92]I'ma keep it in a motion keep it movin' like kinetic ayy
[01:17.82]Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
[01:18.56]Put this s**t in a frame better know I don't blame
[01:20.32]Everything that I say man I seen you deflate
[01:21.78]Let me elevate this ain't a prank
[01:23.09]Have you walkin' on a plank li-li-li-li-like
[01:24.91]Both hands together God let me pray
[01:27.00]Now let me pray
[01:27.76]Uh
[01:28.04]I've been goin' right right around call that relay
[01:30.67]Masked Wolf
[01:31.29]Pass the baton back and I'm on
[01:32.50]Swimmin' in the pool Kendrick Lamar uh
[01:33.89]Ayy
[01:34.17]Want a piece of this a piece of mine my peace a sign
[01:36.25]Can you please read between the lines
[01:37.39]My rhyme's inclined to break your spine
[01:39.00]Spine
[01:39.25]They say that I'm so fine
[01:40.59]Fine
[01:40.82]You could never match my grind
[01:42.26]True
[01:42.41]Please do not not waste my time
[01:43.76]Wolf
[01:44.57]What you know about rollin' down in the deep
[01:47.65]When your brain goes numb you can call that mental freeze
[01:50.80]When these people talk too much
[01:52.35]Put that s**t in slow motion yeah
[01:54.45]I feel like an astronaut in the ocean ayy
[01:57.62]What you know about rollin' down in the deep
[02:00.42]When your brain goes numb you can call that mental freeze
[02:03.68]When these people talk too much
[02:05.25]Put that s**t in slow motion yeah
[02:07.23]I feel like an astronaut in the ocean
data.trans:
[ti:Astronaut In The Ocean]
[ar:Masked Wolf]
[al:Astronaut In The Ocean]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.31]//
[00:04.63]宇航员
[00:14.85]滚下深渊的感觉 你知道多少
[00:18.04]当你大脑麻木时 你可以说精神被冻结了
[00:21.28]当这些人说太多话
[00:22.79]就把这个过程变成慢动作
[00:24.83]我感觉像是在海里的宇航员
[00:28.01]滚下深渊的感觉 你知道多少
[00:30.82]当你大脑麻木时 你可以说精神被冻结了
[00:34.11]当这些人说太多话
[00:35.61]就把这个过程变成慢动作
[00:37.64]我感觉像是在海里的宇航员
[00:40.60]她说我很酷 
[00:41.42]没错
[00:42.01]我觉得她说的没错
[00:43.04]没错
[00:43.68]我相信上帝 
[00:44.81]//
[00:45.22]不相信女人
[00:46.82]她总是把我当傻子
[00:48.04]当傻子
[00:48.42]我也要玩弄她一下
[00:49.62]//
[00:49.98]你们都不了解我的心理
[00:51.30]让我给你描述一下这个画面
[00:52.84]大吵一架 缺乏激情
[00:54.51]没有甜言蜜语 我喝酒买醉
[00:55.77]喝酒买醉
[00:56.20]你看 痛苦无处不在 
[00:57.58]我的状态有点慵懒
[00:59.22]不知道该往哪里走
[01:00.85]音乐很酷 但我还是感觉心如火烧
[01:02.43]精力充沛 你能感受到我的激情
[01:04.02]我要毁灭一切 就像一场大清洗
[01:05.62]//
[01:06.40]让我们把话说明白 我要工作
[01:08.80]//
[01:09.28]即使我的进步没有回报 我也要继续
[01:12.19]继续
[01:12.72]我做的一切都是令人震惊的
[01:14.76]//
[01:14.92]我会保持内心的激情 不断前行 永不止步
[01:17.82]//
[01:18.56]把这玩意儿珍藏起来 但我知道我不怪谁
[01:20.32]朋友 我看着所有事情都反映出你已泄气
[01:21.78]让我帮你振作起来 这不是恶作剧
[01:23.09]你可曾踏过木板
[01:24.91]双手合十诚心地向上帝祈祷
[01:27.00]现在让我祈祷
[01:27.76]//
[01:28.04]我过得还不错 就像参加了一场接力赛
[01:30.67]//
[01:31.29]传递接力棒
[01:32.50]我在泳池里游弋 感受Kendrick Lamar的压力
[01:33.89]//
[01:34.17]想要尝尝这滋味 寻求内心平静
[01:36.25]你能否明白字里行间的意思
[01:37.39]我的歌要会你受不了
[01:39.00]受不了
[01:39.25]他们说我好棒
[01:40.59]好棒
[01:40.82]你永远无法达到我这样的成绩
[01:42.26]没错
[01:42.41]请不要浪费我的时间
[01:43.76]吼叫
[01:44.57]滚下深渊的感觉 你知道多少
[01:47.65]当你大脑麻木时 你可以说精神被冻结了
[01:50.80]当这些人说太多话
[01:52.35]就把这个过程变成慢动作
[01:54.45]我感觉像是在海里的宇航员
[01:57.62]滚下深渊的感觉 你知道多少
[02:00.42]当你大脑麻木时 你可以说精神被冻结了
[02:03.68]当这些人说太多话
[02:05.25]就把这个过程变成慢动作
[02:07.23]我感觉像是在海里的宇航员
